section.p:
The code used to upload project model files: # Get the Model File entity modelDirectory = (await Fs.info(session=session, path= modelFilePath)).content
# Create the File entity object with name and local file path modelFile= FileEntity(session) modelFile.name = “<Model File Name>” modelFile.filePath = “<Model Local File Path>”
# Add the model file entity to the parent Model directory directory.addFile(file=modelFile)
# Set the model fileRef to the Project as its main model file project.modelFile = modelFile.getRef()
